title: Looking for Gold+ to duo with
body: Hey all, top/adc main here looking for someone to duo with that wants Plat and focuses on winning. Post your name here and I can add you :) I do not want a support main, thanks for reading.

replies.body:
Name:a survivor
Ranked tier: gold 5
The ranked tier in season 6: gold 3 to 2
Main: Mid lane
I always play on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday.
We can try one game tonight if you want.
Hey man won't be able to tonight, have work tomorrow :) I'll chuck you an add when I get on
